charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1101_0100:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] and Cynthia were
surveying the ruins...
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1101_0200:
they suddenly heard a melodic voice coming
from somewhere...
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_0400: I’m not sure why, but it sounds lonely to me.
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_0600: Celebi?! Why would you be here?
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_0700:
Oh, hi there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
And Cynthia, too? What a coincidence, running into
you two here!
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_0301_0800: What have you been up to?
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_0401_0900:
Well, Celebi suddenly took off flying, so I followed
and it brought me here.
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_0402_1100:
Oh, is that how you ended up here—following
the singing? That was Celebi!
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_1200:
Celebi’s been crying out a lot lately in a way that
sounds like singing.
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_1400:
You know, Lyra, I’ve seen that outfit you’re
wearing before, in old documents from the
Johto region.
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_1500: Oh, you mean my sygna suit?
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_1600:
Yes. As a scholar of antiquities, I’ve visited Johto
before to study the ruins there.
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_1700:
I’m sure I read that dancers in the region used to
wear clothes like that long ago.
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_1800:
Interesting... Well, Celebi is the Time Travel
Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_1900:
It’s lived through many different eras, so maybe
seeing my outfit reminded it of someone from
the past.
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_2000:
Maybe Celebi remembers seeing someone singing
and dancing in the woods.
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_2100:
Perhaps. It must have met so many different
people and Pokémon throughout the ages...
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_2200:
so I suppose it’s had more than its fair share
of farewells.
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_0401_2400: Yes, good-byes really can be difficult...
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_0402_2600:
Celebi’s been on its journey for so much longer
than any of us...
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_2700:
But thinking of that just makes me want to
treasure my time with Celebi even more!
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_2800:
I want to become just as close with Celebi as any
other person it’s met!
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_2900:
I know! Why don’t we all dance together like those
dancers from long ago?
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_3000: Maybe that’ll make Celebi feel a little less lonely!
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_0401_3200: Thanks so much! I’ll teach you some dance moves!
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_0402_3400: Yeah! I’m sure we’ll all have a great time!
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_3600:
Sure, I’ll join you. It will be an honor to spend
some time with Celebi.
charaepi_ch0002_10_kotone/2301_1201_3900:
We’ll make sure you never feel lonely when you’re
with us!
